text: A relentless champion of Khorne, his name feared and revered throughout the Chaos Wastes.
Once a mortal warlord of the Varg tribe, now stands as Akhara Varg, a fearsome favoured of Khorne, revered by all as a merciless harbinger of bloodshed and chaos.

Embrace the path of blood and steel, for the time of reckoning draws near. As the Varg tribe stands at the precipice of destiny, the whispers of Khorne echo through the winds, calling upon the blood-soaked legacy of Hrothgar Daemonaxe. Should you dedicate the Vargs to the insatiable hunger of Khorne, the Daemon Prince stirs once more, his ancient fury unleashed upon the mortal realms. With his return, the Vargs shall know true terror and unyielding might. Will you answer the call of the Blood God and summon forth the wrath of Hrothgar Daemonaxe to lead your tribe once more
Khorne willing, Hrothgar Daemonaxe will once more walk the planes of the mortal realms.
Khorne willing, Hrothgar Daemonaxe will once more walk the planes of the mortal realms.

With the thunderous roar of a thousand raging storms, Hrothgar Daemonaxe returns from the depths of legend, his allegiance pledged once more to Khorne's eternal hunger. The Varg tribe rejoices as their legendary chieftain, now ascended to daemonhood, leads them in an unrelenting crusade of bloodshed and conquest. Under the crimson banner of Khorne, the Vargs shall carve a path of devastation across the lands, their enemies trembling before the fury of the Daemonaxe's return
Hrothgar's enmity for the followers of Sigmar burns eternal, his hatred driving him to seek vengeance against those who would defy the will of the Blood God.
With a primal roar, Hrothgar leads his warband in a lightning assault, catching the enemy off guard as they descend upon them with savage fury.
Hrothgar's strikes are not merely blows, but savage rends that tear through flesh and bone, leaving his enemies bleeding and broken in his wake.
With each strike against the armored ranks of his foes, Hrothgar's fury grows, his blows guided by the will of Khorne to find weakness in even the strongest defenses.
As the battle reaches its climax, Hrothgar's fury knows no bounds, driving him into a berserk frenzy that sees him cleave through his enemies with unmatched ferocity.
Increases the replenishment rate for Hrothgar's army after battles, representing their penchant for consuming the flesh of their fallen enemies.
Clad in armor forged in the fires of the Blood God's realm, Hrothgar shrugs off blows that would shatter lesser warriors, his indomitable spirit fueled by Khorne's infernal power.
